description: Alexei and Tristan have been close friends since Alexei came to the states from Russia a few years back. Alexei is a sexy, fit gymnast and has been openly gay for a minute. His friend, Tristan, however, claims to be straight. One day, while alone together and bored, Alexei got his chance to pounce on his "straight" friend. Since it didn't take much convincing, Alexei knew he had been right about Tristan this whole time. Watch a hot, teen Russian plow a straight boy's ass into submission.
title: Summer Loving
